Title: Of Mouse and Man
Plot: While investigating a gruesome homicide, Nick learns that a seemingly mild-mannered resident could be festering a potential monster created from a dark childhood. Meanwhile, Monroe is sent an unsettling message by the creature community, who are beginning to wonder if his priorities lie with them or a Grimm.
GuestStars: Amanda Walsh, Fred Koehler, Gavin Hoffman, Ebbe Roe Smith
